body.name: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 43 mins
FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 7 hrs 43 mins
features: BREWS MULTIPLE CUP SIZES: (6, 8, 10 oz.). Enjoy the most popular cup sizes. Use the 6 oz. cup size to achieve the strongest brew.
COFFEE IN NO TIME: Brews K-Cup pods in under a minute.
A COMPACT MULTI-CUP RESERVOIR: 36 oz. removable water reservoir make refilling easy.
SMART START: Your coffee maker heats then brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
SIMPLE BUTTON CONTROLS: Just insert a pod, select your desired cup brew size, and brew a great-tasting cup in under a minute.
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Auto off feature turns the coffee maker off 2 hours after your last brew, helping to save energy.
REMOVABLE DRIP TRAY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0 inches tall, and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
DISPENSE HOT WATER: Open and close the brewer handle (without a pod) and select your cup size for hot water on demand.
body.description: Space saving. Crowd-pleasing. The slender and stylish Keurig K-Compact single serve coffee maker offers consumers a space-saving design to fit their countertop, but still delivers the delicious taste and unparalleled convenience that the Keurig brand is known for. Designed to leave the smallest footprint possible, the Keurig K-Compact brewer in Black is just over 8 inches wide, leaving you plenty of space on your countertop without sacrificing a thing. Brew 6, 8, or 10 oz. of your favorite beverages in under a minute. Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties coffee, tea, hot cocoa, iced beverages, and more and enjoy a perfect cup, every time. Or brew your own ground coffee with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included). The Smart Start feature heats and then brews in one simple process for even more convenience. The K-Compact brewer has a removable drip tray to accommodate travel mugs, and its 36 oz. removable water reservoir allows you to brew multiple cups before refilling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love the coffee from our Keurig but our "old" one of about 5 years old but only used weekends died. Invested in this new one and of course works well and makes great coffee. This one has a few less features than our old one but adequate for our needs. For the record, even with the limited use and only using good quality water reverse osmosis water with occasional cleanings, the original only lasted 5-6 years. To me this is not really made or designed that well but not sure other brands would provide any better overall results? We are hoping this one will be more reliable than the first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One cup at a time
reviews.reviewText: This little machine is awesome, it works by using pods, tea bags and just the right amount of water, so convenient. It's perfect for a single person or the tea, hot chocolate or special pod flavor. No more pots of coffee wasted ,one cup at a time is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I fell in love with the color first , LOL
reviews.reviewText: I've never owned a Keurig before this one because we always went through a full pot of coffee every morning in our family size Cuisinart. Recently I alone had to switch to DeCaf so rather than subject my entire family of caffeine addicts to DeCaf I decided to shop for a Keurig just for me to use for the duration. I have limited counter space for TWO coffee makers so I was shopping for a small Keurig when I found this one and instantly fell in love with the size and color. Now my entire family is hooked on the Keurig and I've relegated the full size Cuisinart to the pantry! The Keurig is quick and easy to use even with the reusable K Cups that we use with our favorite ground coffee and the variety of K Cups available means everyone can make whatever kind of coffee flavor or cocoa or tea they feel like at the moment. It takes up less counter space than my big coffee maker and looks beautiful on the counter. This was a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mine arrived in a brown box, not a Keurig colorful box like you see in retail stores. I contacted Amazon to make sure this wasn't a refurbished item, they assured me item is new. After I contacted Amazon, I saw a small sticker on outside box that says new item. The Keurig had new strapping tape to secure the reservoir and removable plate holder to the coffee pot. It also came with instructions, and coupons good through 2024.It is a wonderful turquoise color. I did the test run, and mine is not loud, as others have said in their reviews. The water comes out fine, doesn't spray everywhere. I use mine for Keurig brand Swiss Miss hot chocolate, which is delicious. The temperature of hot chocolate is very hot, as it should be.The reservoir size is small, it holds two 16.9 oz. of bottled water, with a little bit of room for more. For no more than I use it, that's plenty for me.The cord is on the shorter side, which is noted in the instructions as being for safety reasons-so the Keurig won't be pulled off counter by a longer cord. It works fine for where I have mine sitting.Overall, I'm very happy with this Keurig. I bought it when it was on sale for $50.00. I would by again, as it works and looks great for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me a sec to realize where the full line was for the water reservoir but other than that this thing works great. It fits perfectly on my counter top (which is small) and holds enough water that you can have 3-4 cups of coffee before having to refill again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m not wasting coffee anymore
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been thinking about purchasing a keurig for several years. All my friends have one. Glad I finally purchased one. It’s simple to use and I’m not wasting coffee anymore. Pricing was fair and packaging was excellent. This keurig should last me a long time with proper maintenance of course

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally got a Keurig!
reviews.reviewText: I have always wanted a Keurig, but I hesitated always because of the price, and the fact that I knew I wouldn't use it terribly often. I don't drink coffee daily, and I drink it at home even more rarely. But when my son or someone else is visiting, it's nice to be able to offer a cup of coffee quickly, and have it turn out right. I wanted one that has a smaller footprint, I don't have a lot of counter or cupboard space. In truth, this is a little bigger than I would have liked, but it I made it work. It's not huge by any means, but I know there is a slimmer model too. I know some of the models have various bells and whistles, but this is relatively simple. The only adjustment available is the choice of three different cup sizes. I would have liked to have a feature that makes it a bit stronger, but that's for next time. Overall, I'm extremely happy with it, and I'm glad I finally bought one. I'm happy with my choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works fine, but a little too loud.
reviews.reviewText: Brews coffee as expected, but is loud when dispensing coffee. Also, I thought at first the brew lights were not working, but it was just me not being patient enough...and being use to a larger and older model.

Beautiful turquoise coffee maker. It works well. As it is not digital, it is very easy to operate. It heats up and brews quickly.Update…this coffee maker stopped working just a few days after 3 months so can’t return it. Very disappointed as it was a gift. Have bought a similar one before that that has lasted a few years.

reviews.reviewTitle: A working product. No issue yet.
reviews.reviewText: The whole family is happily using it, for coffee, chocolate and tea. Not cheap but it works.

Love this machine. I had an identical one for years and it was starting to show blue light more and more. Can't complain as we have family working from home and the Keurig is on continually. Finally got rid of my bigger coffee pot so saves a lot of room. Have tried other Keurigs but this is the best I have found. Compact for space but makes about 3 big mugs before needing to refill. No question about replacing it with any other coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great machine, easy to use and good selection of coffee pods available.
The best way to start your day. My new keirig is awesome. I'm really enjoying my coffee. 😊
